description: This file defines the main entry point widget for a Flutter application called 'Memory Keeper'. It sets up providers for state management, applies theming, and specifies the home page widget.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Memory Keeper app, responsible for setting up providers, theme, and home page.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, setting up MultiProvider and MaterialApp.

methods.name: _createNotesProvider
methods.description: Creates and returns an instance of NotesProvider.

methods.name: _createWalletProvider
methods.description: Creates and returns an instance of WalletProvider.
